response.overview: When Christy discovers her 10-year-old daughter Anna has a rare, incurable disease, she becomes a ferocious advocate for her daughter’s healing as she searches for a solution. After Anna has a freak accident and falls three stories, a miracle unfolds in the wake of her dramatic rescue that leaves medical specialists mystified, her family restored and their community inspired.
response.tagline: How do we explain the impossible?
response.title: Miracles from Heaven

titles.title: Miracles From Heaven: A Little Girl, Her Journey to Heaven, and Her Amazing Story of Healing

cast.name: Summer Corbitt
cast.character: Summer in waiting room play area (uncredited)
